attributes.action: Increase the tax on sugar and put the profit into the NHS
attributes.additional_details: I would like to see the tax on sugar increased significantly to make it more costly / less accessible for people to buy I.e. Sugary (pure and artificially sweetened) drinks / food / beverages and put the increase / profit directly into the NHS to research and treat health related medical conditions I.e. Obesity, tooth decay, mental health, cancer, diabetes, Alzheimer's, non alcoholic fatty liver disease etc - thank you.
